Method Detail

start

public void start(boolean distributed,
                  java.lang.String sessionname)
           throws java.lang.Exception
start negotiation. Run it in different thread, so that we can return control to AWT/Swing That is important to avoid deadlocks in case any negosession wants to open a frame.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception

startTournament

@Action
public void startTournament()

joinDistributedTournament

@Action
public void joinDistributedTournament()
Join a distributed tournament by retrieving the tournament from the DB. A subset of the sessions of the tournament are executed, after which a new subset is requested. This process continues until the full job has been processed.

startDistributedTournament

@Action
public void startDistributedTournament()
Start a distributed tournament by storing the tournament and its jobs in the database. Following, the steps are identical to joining a distributed tournament.

startDTournament

public void startDTournament(boolean storeJobs)
Starts a distributed tournament.

Parameters:
storeJobs - true if startTournament, false if join
